pkgmetadata.longdescription: *oneliner*----------This module tries to improve Python's usefulness as a tool for writingshell one-liners... code-block:: bash # show line numbers python -m oneliner -ne '"%5d: %s" % (NR, _)' < input.txt # convert unix timestamp to something more human readable date +%s | pyl -j ' => ' -line '_, datetime.datetime.fromtimestamp(int(_))' # 1355256353 => 2012-12-11 22:05:53 # triple space a file pyl -ne 'line + "\n"*2' < input.txt # double space only non-blank lines: pyl -ne '_ if re.match("^$", _) else _+"\n"' input.txtDocumentation: http://python-oneliner.readthedocs.org/en/latest/Development: https://github.com/gvalkov/python-onelinerPackage: http://pypi.python.org/pypi/oneliner
